casebody.data:
No. 09-7127. Christopher James Vargas, Petitioner v. United States. 562 U.S. 1078, 131 S. Ct. 632, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 9356.

178 L. Ed. 2d 508,

November 29, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 339 Fed. Appx. 428.
